nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures

Class PostProcessTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures.Texture
      • nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures.Texture2D
        • nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures.PostProcessTexture

  • public class PostProcessTexture
extends Texture2D
    Generic wrapper for a Texture made out of an (initially) empty ByteBuffer.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostProcessTexture(int width, int height, int glMultitexUnit)
      Default constructor, wrapper for an (initially) empty ByteBuffer.

    • Method Summary

        init, unBind, use

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostProcessTexture

        public PostProcessTexture(int width,
                  int height,
                  int glMultitexUnit)
        Default constructor, wrapper for an (initially) empty ByteBuffer. Do not forget to call Texture2D.init(javax.media.opengl.GL3) before use.
        Parameters:
        glMultitexUnit - The OpenGL-internal MultitexUnit (GL.GL_TEXTUREX) this texture uses.
        width - The width of this texture.
        height - The height of this texture.
